numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that the percentage of players of color in the NBA is 83%.
2. I notice that the percentage of players of color in the WNBA is 83%.
3. The NBA has the highest percentage of players of color among the five leagues.
4. The WNBA has the highest percentage of players of color among the five leagues.
5. The MLB has the lowest percentage of players of color among the five leagues.
6. Each of the five leagues has a higher proportion of players of color than head coaches of color.
7. I wonder if data from other leagues around the world would show similar results.
8. The English Premier League is a league around the world.
9. The CBA is a league around the world.
10. This shows me that coaching staffs are often less diverse than the teams.
11. If coaching staffs are less diverse, then fewer people of color are in coaching positions.
12. If fewer people of color are in coaching positions, then fewer people of color exist to look up to in coaching positions.
13. The headline is: Are sports really as diverse as we think?
